GSD.product_version: versions from v3.2 to before v4.9.293
GSD.description:
can: sja1000: fix use after free in ems_pcmcia_add_card()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.293 by commit 1dd5b819f7e406dc15bbc7670596ff25261aaa2a, it was introduced in version v3.2 by commit fd734c6f25aea4b2b44b045e489aec67b388577e. For more details please see the references link.
